name: Sunset Attack
description:
Kill all enemies as fast as possible. Shoot wisely.
Game is over when health or bullets end.
Hint: When you get very good it will take you approximately 6 minutes to win the game.

Keys:

Move :     A/D     Or:     Left-arrow/Right-arrow     Or:     Keypad 4/6

Shoot: Spacebar

Use mouse in menus (left click)
